home.description: Ljiljana MarinkoviÄ‡ is both artist and front end programmer, whose main occupation is web development. Considering art, her main medium is ceramics, but she also greatly uses other art forms such as video, photography, painting, etc. Regarding web development, her prime language and tool is javascript.
home.subtitle: Visual artist and Web developer
home.web_desc: The simplicity of usage and content maintenance, as well as the clarity of the web page, represent the base of web development. Design should be adjusted to the needs of the client and the user so that it could represent the client and its business in the best possible way, thereby functionalities and access to the information should remain intuitive for the user.
home.order_instr: If you are intrested in ordering a website, please fill in the form and click the button 'SEND', and you will be contacted soon. The price of the website and the time required for its development depends on different factors, like the type of the website (personal page, corporate presentation, portfolio, web app...), domain and web hosting, photo editing, etc. Therefore, by filling in the form, you will get the answer about the price and the time needed for its completion.
home.send_email: Or you could send a message with precise demands:

success.web_ord: You have successfully ordered a web site. You will be contacted soon via email. Thank You for ordering.
success.art_ord: You have successfully ordered the artwork/s. You will be contacted soon about the information of the arrival. Thank You for ordering.
